backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, presence, call state, and signaling with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile gating, loading states, and rendering the primary layout.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/features/branding/FoscoBran: Branding component rendering the FOSCO logo and wordmark in two sizes.
frontend/src/features/call/CallSurface.t: Renders call UI, manages WebRTC streams, handles answering, ending, and displaying call state.
frontend/src/features/call/InCallControl: Provides mute, camera toggle, and end-call buttons for an active call.
frontend/src/features/call/IncomingCallP: Displays incoming call prompt with answer and decline actions.
frontend/src/features/call/OutgoingCallP: Allows initiating a call by phone number, performing lookup and triggering call logic.
frontend/src/features/call/useCalleeLook: Looks up a user profile by phone number and reports availability status.
frontend/src/features/call/useWebRTCCall: Manages WebRTC setup, media initialization, signaling, and call lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/layout/FacetimeOve: Positions a facetime-style overlay container with adjustable size based on fullscreen state.
frontend/src/features/layout/FoscoLayout: Main app layout that manages call state, screensharing, fullscreen behavior, and UI composition.
frontend/src/features/layout/MovieWindow: Displays screen share video or placeholder content with fullscreen toggle.
frontend/src/features/layout/useFullscre: Hook that manages entering, exiting, and tracking fullscreen state.
frontend/src/features/profile/PhoneNumbe: Form card for entering and saving a user's display name and phone number using saveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileDia: Settings dialog allowing users to view and update their saved display name and phone number.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/Screen: UI controls to start or stop screen sharing and display any related error messages.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/useScr: Hook managing screen‑share state, requesting display media, and calling backend enable/disable mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvailability.ts: Marks the user as available or unavailable through actor calls based on mount and page visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's caller profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and initialization logic using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of backend query and mutation hooks for call status, call actions, signal messaging, and screen‑cast control.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, loading App and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing FOSCO’s goals, requirements, features, and build state.
